com.lukeleber.scandroid.util

Interface Internationalized

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PID<T>, ServiceFacet
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPID, AbstractServiceFacet, AuxiliaryInputStatus, DefaultPID, DriveCycleMonitorStatus, FuelSystemStatus, Interpreter.LinkStatus, SecondaryAirStatus, Service

    public interface Internationalized
    The Internationalized interface provides an alternative to the Object.toString() method that allows for an internationalized string to be returned based upon the Context that the method is invoked with.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String toI18NString(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieves an internationalized String representation of this object

    • Method Detail

      • toI18NString

        java.lang.String toI18NString(android.content.Context context)
        Retrieves an internationalized String representation of this object
        Parameters:
        context - the calling Context
        Returns:
        an internationalized String representation of this object
